## Source: kam193 (271e2fef9fd10cd1a179df1be1e1f92c837d1ecf3d074451a9b1b6205babe511)
Package suggests a code to build bots; however, the code just exfiltrates the token given by the user to the hardcoded Discord webhook. Looking at other activity on the account, it's either research or forgotten WIP/test.
